ovdesc.p: The Abbreviation Table has been developed to allow Applications and functions which are used regularly to be abbreviated thereby reducing keystrokes.
These are examples of how Applications can be allocated standard Abbreviations
CUSTOMER CU LIST.PROFILE LP PREIODIC.INTEREST PI
If required, functions can also be included in the Abbreviation table e.g.
CUSTOMER INPUT CI CUSTOMER AUTHORISE CA CUSTOMER DISPLAY INDIVIDUAL RECORD CS CUSTOMER DISPLAY LIST CL

desc.p: This is the Abbreviation code by which the original text can be identified.
This field is used to specify the Abbreviation which will generate the ORIGINAL TEXT specified in Field ORIGINAL.TEXT.
2-35 type SS (uppercase alpha or numeric, first character alpha) characters. No comma will be allowed in the Abbreviation text.
Indicates the original Application, Function command or record ID from which the Abbreviation was created.
This field contains the Application and Function commands to be performed and the record to be accessed in response to the Abbreviation being entered.
It should be ensured that, when entering this field, the correct text is Input as no validation is performed.
